caption:
Chicken noodle pot pie with @omsom coconut lemongrass curry sauce noodles!

Looking for a savory bake? Comment “send recipe” to get the recipe DM’d to you! Check your folders in case you don’t see it or you can find it on Omsom’s website :)

Creamy, cozy, and bursting with flavor, this chicken pot pie noodle is comfort food for sure!!! I loved adding some chicken (or shred some rotisserie chicken) to make it a classic (but with an Asian twist, hehe) chicken pot pie. 

use your favorite protein and veggies ٩(^ᗜ^ )و ´- — !!!

carrots, CORN, onions, potatoes? Totally works and super versatile~ using premade puff pastry saves you a ton of steps👏

Follow @SparkleCakerie if you want to learn more about how baking is fun and approachable from me (Sharon), a professionally trained pastry artist :)

#recipeidea #savorybaking #chickenpotpie #chickennoodle #dinneridea #potpie 

https://omsom.com/blogs/second-menu/chicken-noodle-pot-pie
